title: Center of mass velocity - 3-block system masses

content.question: Which of the following equations correctly relates <math alttext="m sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="m sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="m sub 3" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>m</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msub> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="m sub 1, end sub, plus, m sub 2, end sub, equals, 3 m sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="m sub 1, end sub, plus, m sub 2, end sub, equals, m sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="m sub 1, end sub, plus, m sub 2, end sub, plus, m sub 3, end sub, equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="m sub 1, end sub, plus, m sub 2, end sub, equals, one half times, m sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="m sub 1, end sub, plus, m sub 2, end sub, equals, 3 m sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
